column4: hmm, apt-get wants to install a bunch of elib packages, to install entrance. I don't want that to conflict with my already made e17 stuffs. I just want its commands that it does when it configures entrance at the end, anyone know how to get that?
is there a way to force a package to install disregarding dependency packages?
it should find the libs it needs, even tho the packages aren't installed for them
